package.name: Services_Facebook
package.description: An interface for accessing Facebook's web services API at http://api.facebook.com.
package.notes: * Added connect.getUnconnectedFriendsCount * Updated users.hadAppPermission to support more permisions and a uid * Corrected auth.revokeAuthorization, session key required

release.notes: * 1. Added singleton method for Services_Facebook. 2. Updated Notifications.send() to use new names for types. (user_to_user and app_to_user) * Added CURL timeout for requests. * Added method getPhoto for users.
* Added missing dependency for Validate. * Fixed a typo in a constant in Services_Facebook_Notifications.

* Added new auth endpoints. * Added new modifications to notification.send(). * Added new feed endpoints. * Added get and set for api url to allow use of beta and connect api urls * Additions to fix Bug #14351 * Thanks to Matt Fonda for the patches! * Applied patch for fix regarding PEAR Bug #14361. Undefined variable in __get. * Fixed bug for undefined varible $url in Services_Facebook_Common::sendRequest(). Fixes #14349.
* Fixed parse error in Feed.php (Bug #14196) * Docblock cleanup
* Updated code to largely pass all of the PEAR CS problems brought up by phpcs

* Updated Services_Facebook_Profile::setFBML() to accept new parameters * Finished marketplace driver endpoints * Added admin, application and pages drivers * Switched to lazy loading of drivers * Added Services_Facebook_Share to parse Facebook style share meta data from HTML source
* Completed all of the other endpoints. * Added Services_Facebook_Share::parse() to parse out share partner meta information.
